string-array.name: event_info_array
string-array.item: Click on the object when it appears.
Click on the outer arrow pointing in the same direction as the center arrow.
Tap space above as many times as possible within 5 seconds.
Press yes if the card has been shown before, no if it has not. \nThere will twenty cards
If the text colour of the top word matches the word colour below, press Match.\nIf not press No Match.
Give the question a rating from 0 to 5.\n With 5 Being the highest.
